Title: Good Intentions
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Benjamin Cavell, Elmore Leonard (short story "Fire in the Hole"), Leonard Chang (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: Raylan is threatened by a mystery man at Charles Monroe's mansion, Boyd faces a surprise temptation while trying to figure out who stole his shipment, and cousin Daryl encourages Dewey to stand up to Boyd.
